overview: An un-named outcast from society starts following cultist beliefs, especially the teachings of 'Dante's Inferno' which states:  "Who inflicts misery and slaughter on those who commit upon one of the four deadly sins, will consequently deliver liberation to Satan."  The cultist makes it his duty to deliver that liberation, even at the cost of his own life.
tagline: Awake! Arise! or be forever fall'n.
title: Dante's Inferno
